attributes.action: raise the 40% tax band at least to £43000.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: More and more hard working people are leaving the country due to the 40% tax rate being so low. There are people who even work till they reach the 40% tax rate and then refuse to work any more overtime, whish is required to keep some businesses afloat. The working hard workin person is being penalised by this. Since creating a 50% tax band, the government could afford this change.
